gen:link.msg:message: `LiabilitiesNoncurrentMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende domeinleden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`LiabilitiesNoncurrentMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende domeinleden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesMovement_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
